diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Massive penile and scrotal foreign body granulomata caused by self-injection of liquid paraffin and petroleum jelly
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient presented with massive enlargement of the external genitalia and granulomatous changes after repeated self-injection of liquid paraffin and petroleum jelly over a 5-year period, with histology revealing ulcerated skin and poorly formed granulomas. Imaging confirmed the diagnosis.
